SELECT * FROM CUSTOMERS
WHERE CUSTOMER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%')

SELECT C.CUSTOMER_NAME ,R.REQUEST_DATE ,P.PRODUCT_NAME ,R.QUANTITY , P.PRODUCT_PRICE ,(P.PRODUCT_PRICE * QUANTITY) AS PRODUCT_PRICE ,REQUEST_STATUS FROM order_requests R , products P , customers C WHERE R.PRODUCT_NUM = P.PRODUCT_NUM AND C.CUSTOMER_NUM = R.CUSTOMER_NUM AND R.REQUEST_NUM = #{requestNum}

SELECT REQUEST_NUM ,REQUEST_DATE ,REQUEST_STATUS ,C.CUSTOMER_NUM ,C.CUSTOMER_NAME ,(R.QUANTITY * P.PRODUCT_PRICE) as TOTALPRICE FROM order_requests R, customers C, products P WHERE R.CUSTOMER_NUM = C.CUSTOMER_NUM AND R.PRODUCT_NUM = P.PRODUCT_NUM
AND ( REQUEST_DATE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%') OR REQUEST_STATUS LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchValue}, '%') )
ORDER BY REQUEST_NUM DESC
